titleStmt.title: A catholike appeale for Protestants, out of the confessions of the Romane doctors particularly answering the mis-named Catholike apologie for the Romane faith, out of the Protestants: manifesting the antiquitie of our religion, and satisfying all scrupulous obiections which haue bene vrged against it. Written by Th. Morton Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Morton, Thomas, 1564-1659.

titleStmt.title: A catholike appeale for Protestants, out of the confessions of the Romane doctors particularly answering the mis-named Catholike apologie for the Romane faith, out of the Protestants: manifesting the antiquitie of our religion, and satisfying all scrupulous obiections which haue bene vrged against it. Written by Th. Morton Doctor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Morton, Thomas, 1564-1659.

publicationStmt.publisher: [Printed by Richard Field] impensis Georg. Bishop & Ioh. Norton,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Anderton, Lawrence. The Protestants apologie for the Roman Church.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
